p:
The elemental analyses were done by Varian UltraMass™ ICP-MS system (Varian Optical Spectroscopy Instruments, Melbourne Australia). The plasma source was 99.998% argon (Carbagas 3097, Liebefeld, Bern, Switzerland). All operating parameters were under computer control. Operating conditions of the instrument are depicted in Table 1.Table 1
Operating conditions of Varian ICP-MS
ParametersSettings
Plasma conditions
RF power1.40 kW
Plasma Ar flow rate.18.0 L min−1
Auxiliary Ar flow rate2.25 L min−1
Sheath gas flow0.20 L min−1
Nebulizer gas flow1.0 L min−1
Sampling depth6.50 mm
Pump Rate5 rpm
Instrument
Sampler cone: Nikel1.0 mm orifice diameter
Skimmer cone: Nikel0.5 mm orifice diameter
